parameter.label: Billing Service Value
parameter.tooltip: GBMembers Billing Service call value (registerUser,billingInfo,)

parameter.label: Space slug
parameter.tooltip: Space slug for School

parameter.label: Billing Company
parameter.tooltip: Billing Company that the service will operate against.(eg, PaySmart)

parameter.label: JSON arguments
parameter.tooltip: A JSON structure containing all argument passed to the Billing Service

task.label: Update Paysmart
task.value: !@values['Update as a PaySmart variation'].nil? && !@values['Update as a PaySmart variation'].index("Update Paysmart").nil?

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being updated.

parameter.label: State
parameter.tooltip: The value used to set the submission state.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of field names to values that should be set.

parameters.parameter: { "Billing Parent Member":"<%= @values['Members']%>", "Billing Customer Id":"<%=JSON.parse(@results['Get Billing User']['Result JSON'])['data']['customerBillingId']%>", "Billing Customer Reference":"<%=JSON.parse(@results['Get Billing User']['Result JSON'])['data']['customerReference']%>", "Billing Payment Type":"<%=JSON.parse(@results['Get Billing User']['Result JSON'])['data']['paymentMethod']%>", "Billing Payment Period":"<%=JSON.parse(@results['Get Billing User']['Result JSON'])['data']['paymentPeriod']%>", "Payment Schedule": "{period: '<%= @values['Payment Frequency']%>', amount: <%=JSON.parse(@results['Get Billing User']['Result JSON'])['data']['paymentAmountInCents']%>}", "Billing Family Members": "<%= @values['membersJSON'].gsub('"','\"')%>", "Family Fee Details": "<%= @values['feesJSON'].gsub('"','\"')%>", "Membership Cost": "<%= @values['Payment Total']%>" }

parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.tooltip: Set the origin ID.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission exists in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission for which the activity is being created for.

parameter.label: Label
parameter.tooltip: The label for the submission activity.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: The description of the submission activity.

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: Specifies the a submission activity 'Type', which should indicate what type of data is included.

parameter.label: Data
parameter.tooltip: Additional data that can be used by resources consuming the submission activity record (for example a Request bundle may render submission details based upon JSON content in the activity data).

parameters.parameter: {"Message":"Setup of Billing Program details for <%= @values['Student First Name']%> <%= @values['Student Last Name']%> has been applied"}

parameter.label: JSON
parameter.tooltip: The JSON String to be converted to XML

parameter.label: Data Source:
parameter.tooltip: The source that contains the data to use to create each task in the loop.

parameter.label: Loop Path:
parameter.tooltip: The XPath statement to indicate what data records to process.

parameter.label: Variable Name:
parameter.tooltip: The local variable name used to represent the data used in loop tasks.

parameter.label: Type:
parameter.tooltip: How many loop processes must be completed before continuing?

parameter.label: Number:
parameter.tooltip: If some, how many?

parameters.parameter: { "customerId": "<%= @values['Billing Customer Id']%>", "billingService": "PaySmart", "space": "<%= @space['Slug']%>", "schedulePeriodType": "<%= @values['Billing Period'] %>", "flag": "<%= (@values['Make Permanent'].include? "Make Permanent") ? "1" : "" %>", "scheduleStartDate": "<%= @values['Date Affective']%>", "scheduleResumeDate": "<%= (@values['Resume Date Option']=="Resume Date" ? @values['Date Payments Resume'] : "")%>", "paymentAmountInCents": "<%= (@values['Payment Total'].to_i * 100) %>" }

parameters.parameter:
<%= content = {} content["Form"] = @form['Name'] content["Date"] = @submission['Submitted At'] content["url"] = "/#/kapps/services/requests/request/#{@submission['Id']}/review"
values = {} values["Member ID"] = @values['Members'] values["Type"] = "Request" values["Direction"] = "Inbound" values["Content"] = content.to_json
values.to_json %>
